Description
===========

TaskTypes
---------

The types are described `here <https://bbpteam.epfl.ch/project/spaces/display/BBPWFA/Platform+Type+Standardization>`_.

Primative types

- StringType
- DoubleType
- LongType
- BooleanType
- ListOf

Complicated types

- URIType

TaskOps
-------

Operations that are available to convert types, verify that parameters and
arguments match, and general helpers with regard to the above specified types.
